text:
One of the scattered creations of the [[giant]] wizard-king ''Addis-Ro'', the Pyramid of the Ebon Flame is a surviving ruin of Xen’drik’s ancient empires. This huge, unbreakable, black glass monolith looms over a stretch of the floodplain of the [[Hydra River]]. Addis-Ro was said to have experimented with powers drawn directly from the depths of [[Khyber]], and this mysterious ziggurat supposedly marks the passage through which he made his journeys below.

Surrounding the pyramid are statues of humanoids with crocodile-like features and feathered wings in place of arms.
title: Pyramid of the Ebon Flame
